snippet: In one of the few states with enough animals for a hunting season, an annual lottery drew 13,400 people who hoped to secure one of 275 permits for an October hunt.
abstract: More than 13,400 people enter the annual lottery for a permit to hunt moose in New Hampshire in October; the state is one of only a few with enough moose to allow a hunting season, and the lottery is an annual rite that captures the attention of hunters in state and out.
lead_paragraph: In one of the few states with enough animals for a hunting season, an annual lottery drew 13,400 people who hoped to secure one of 275 permits for an October hunt.

headline.seo: New Hampshire Holds Lottery for Moose Hunt
headline.main: In New Hampshire, a Coveted Chance to Hunt a Moose
headline.print_headline: In New Hampshire, a Coveted Chance to Hunt a Moose
